sourcesContent:
const Menu = [
        {
          id: 1,
          image: "images/waffles.jpg",
          name: "Belgian Waffles",
          category: "breakfast",
          price: "12₹",
          description:
            "Belgian waffles are a variety of waffle with a lighter batter, larger squares, and deeper pockets than American waffles. Belgian waffles were originally leavened with yeast, but baking powder is now often used.",
        },
      
        {
          id: 2,
          image: "images/burger.jpg",
          name: "Beef Burger",
          category: "evening",
          price: "20₹",
          description:
            "A thick, juicy beef patty, cheese losing its hard edges as it melts overtop, a slathering of sauce, a spoonful of tangy relish and a couple of slices of smoky, salty bacon, a bit of onion, some tomato and crisp lettuce all tucked between two halves of a bun: it is all the things I could want. ",
        },
        {
          id: 3,
          image: "images/frenchtoast.jpg",
          name: "French Toast",
          category: "breakfast",
          price: "10₹",
          description:
            "French toast is a dish made of sliced bread soaked in beaten eggs and typically milk, then pan fried. Alternative names and variants include 'eggy bread', 'Bombay toast', 'gypsy toast', and 'poor knights'.",
        },
        {
          id: 4,
          image: "../images/bowl.jpg",
          name: "Chicken Bowl",
          category: "lunch",
          price: "50₹",
          description:
            "Chicken salad is any salad with chicken as a main ingredient. Other common ingredients may include mayonnaise, hard-boiled egg, celery, onion, pepper, pickles and a variety of mustards.",
        },
        {
          id: 5,
          image: "../images/pizza.jpg",
          name: "pizza",
          category: "evening",
          price: "80₹",
          description:
            "Pizza is a dish of Italian origin consisting of a usually round, flat base of leavened wheat-based dough topped with tomatoes, cheese, and often various other ingredients (such as anchovies, mushrooms, onions, olives, pineapple, meat, etc.)",
        },
        {
          id: 6,
          image: "../images/steak.jpg",
          name: "Fillet Mignon",
          category: "dinner",
          price: "180₹",
          description:
            "Filet mignon is a cut of meat taken from the smaller end of the tenderloin, or psoas major of an animal carcass. In French, it mostly refers to cuts of pork tenderloin. ",
        },
        {
          id: 7,
          image: "../images/pasta.jpg",
          name: "Alfredo Pasta",
          category: "dinner",
          price: "60₹",
          description:
            "In 1914, Alfredo di Lelio, a Roman man with a Restaurant in (where grandma was born and raised) was popular among American tourists, and he named his butter and cheese linguine after himself. ",
        },
        {
          id: 8,
          image: "../images/sandwich.jpg",
          name: "Club Sandwich",
          category: "lunch",
          price: "60₹",
          description:
            "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Blanditiis, at consectetur totam voluptatibus quibusdam iusto. Accusamus quas, soluta ipsam autem eius necessitatibus fugiat in . ",
        },
        {
          id: 9,
          image: "../images/rolls.jpg",
          name: "Spring Rolls",
          category: "evening",
          price: "10₹",
          description:
            "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Blanditiis, at consectetur totam voluptatibus quibusdam iusto. Accusamus quas, soluta ipsam autem eius necessitatibus fugiat in . ",
        },
      ];

export default Menu;
